summary: Young Emily Walton, who has suffered from psychosomatic blindness ever since the car accident that took her mother's life, must summon every instinct at her disposal to protect herself and her loved ones from a mysterious intruder.
cast: Ian Bamberg|Noell Coet|Adam C. Edwards|Stephanie Erb|Daniel Hugh Kelly|Erica Leerhsen|Shannon Makhanian|Charlie O'Connell|Stephen Rhodes|Richard Riehle|Ally Walker
title: Mischief Night
